Lab 3 Instruction: Serverless Functions

Durham College - SEIT

Ramiyan Gangatharan

100835223

December 13, 2024

Web Development: Frameworks

  • lab 1A
  • lab 1B
  • lab 2A
  • lab 2B
  • lab 3A
  • lab 3B
navigate here

Look up several different "serverless function" providers (Netlify, AWS, Google, Microsoft, etc).
Compare and contrast, then pick one to host your new function. Look up several different web services intended to send e-mail (SendGrid, MailGun, MailChimp, etc). Explain the differences between them.
Choose one (preferable one with a free tier).
